rules_text: {R}, {T}, Sacrifice another creature: Kobbit, Burly Butcher deals damage equal to the sacrificed creature’s power to any target.
rules_text2:
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Cut of the Day: You gain 3 life.
When you sacrifice Cut of the Day, create a token that’s a copy of target artifact or creature you control. It gains haste. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.
notes:
Changed names, added art, added flavor text
Front: Goblin —> Orc, 1MV 1/1 —> 4MV 4/3
+Legendary backside
Changed back to only copy your permanents.
Added the ability for the back to copy creatures.
